Internet Remarks: Welcome to #474/476 at The Hilton Whistler! Located a stone's throw from both Whistler & Blackcomb Gondolas, The Hilton has no owner use restrictions and sits in one of the very best Whistler Village locations. This professionally managed property was completely remodeled in 2006, then upgraded in 2019 & is a unique lock-off floor plan offering the flexibility of a 2 bed plan or 2 separate suites as needed for your personal use or your rental guests. One side is a studio suite with kitchen & bath and the other side is another studio suite with bdrm area & bthrm. Free parking for 2 cars plus spa, pool, restaurant, apres-ski lounge, concierge service and wireless internet service round out the amenities found in all rooms. Please be aware that although unlimited owner use is possible, owners are subjected to a fee of approximately 18% of the hotel’s room rate while staying in their property. 12% of these funds go to The Hilton's royalty fees and 6% goes to the reserve fund for future renovations to your suite.
